  • ELEMENT

org.voltdb

Annotation Type ProcInfo


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface ProcInfo
    Annotates a stored procedure with information needed by the stored procedure compiler.
    See Also:
    VoltProcedure, ProcInfoData

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String partitionInfo
      Information needed to direct this procedure call to the proper partition(s).
      boolean singlePartition
      Is the procedure meant for a single partition?

    • Element Detail

      • partitionInfo

        public abstract String partitionInfo
        Information needed to direct this procedure call to the proper partition(s).
        Returns:
        A string of the form "table.column: parametername" that maps columns in a table to a parameter value. This is required for a single-sited procedure.
        Default:
        ""

      • singlePartition

        public abstract boolean singlePartition
        Is the procedure meant for a single partition?
        Returns:
        True if all statements run on the same partition always, false otherwise.
        Default:
        false
